column4: Can someone help me figure out why my laptop locks up when I insert my pcmcia card?
No, it crashes even when it boots with the card inserted.
Airgo Networks (Its a Netgear pcmcia card)
I think a module is conflicting, but I can't figure out how to find out which one
could well be; I had a devil of a time getting a pcmcia card to work back on Dapper (6.06)
How did you eventually get it working?
could you pastebin the full output for that card to paste.ubuntu.com
is that where it shows up? then yes
I'm having to use ndiswrapper. I can install the driver, but when I put the card it the system locks up.
The card is a Netgear WPNT511, if that helps.
Thanks for the link. It's a ton of stuff to do but I'll try it out.
